snippet.title: Stand-Alone - Official Release Window Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Watch as a sheep takes down enemies in this action-packed tailer for Stand-Alone, an upcoming action roguelite game featuring skill-deck building. Step into and be a sheep armed with a sci-fi greatsword, carving a path through wolves. Modify your skills within the desolate worlds of a sci-fi apocalypse to create a unique combat style that is all your own. Stand-Alone will be available on Steam in summer 2025.
